tasks.label: Flutter: Build Debug APK
tasks.command: cd app && flutter pub get && flutter build apk --debug

tasks.label: Flutter: Build Release APK
tasks.command: cd app && flutter pub get && flutter build apk --release

tasks.label: Flutter: Open APK Folder
tasks.command: explorer.exe app\build\app\outputs\flutter-apk || xdg-open app/build/app/outputs/flutter-apk || open app/build/app/outputs/flutter-apk

tasks.label: Deploy: WebSocket Server to Droplet
tasks.command: ssh root@209.38.85.244 'cd /root/doewah && git pull && npm install'

tasks.label: Deploy: Full (Pull + WS Server)
tasks.command: ssh root@209.38.85.244 'cd /root/doewah && git pull && npm install && pkill -f "node ws/server.js" || true && nohup node ws/server.js > /root/logs/ws-server.log 2>&1 &'
